content: I’ve purposely put off writing this post… my daughters and I recently had to come to grips with losing our little Daisy.  She’s now crossed over to the Rainbow Bridge.  Born in the Bronx… the breeder named her “Buster”… Nikki named her Daisy. She and Alex had a crazy bond..  For 13 years she has been our rock. She was simply the sweetest...  but one tough cookie. Yes she had attitude but it was tempered with her gentle disposition… she took cuddling to another stratosphere… and yet she was independent and content to curl up in a ball and snuggle in one of her 8 beds around the house or lay on top of my big bag full of cosmetics and stuff that was always by the front door. Alex and Nikki grew up with her… she was their sister… She was a Stokes… she was a precious member of our family. We are heartbroken that she is no longer here… but grateful to have had such a wonderful little girl.  Hope she’s found peace and happiness. We love you Daisy.
name: Lori Stokes
title: Timeline Photos

content:
For 96 Years the YWCA Bergen County has been a champion for the community it serves! I had the privildege last night to welcome the guests and present Lee Woodruff with the Beacon of Light award for her work as a journalist, mother, author and activist. I am proud to work with the YWCA Bergen as it fights racism and enriches women's lives!

http://www.ywcabergencounty.org/careers/
name: Lori Stokes

content: Wishing happy Mother's Day to all who nurture... love...advise... encourage... empower... shelter... discipline... inspire... guide... embrace... Here's the exchange I had this morning with my dear friend... Robin Roberts who everyday does just that and more.  Happy Mother's Day to all!

content: 600 plus expected tonight to celebrate the life changing work of Selfhelp! I am delighted to host tonight's Selfhelp Gala 2017! 81 years ago Selfhelp began providing vital aid for victims of fleeing Nazi persecution. Today there are roughly 50,000 Holocaust survivors and Selfhelp  continues today to serve over 20,000 New Yorkers with housing for seniors, in home care and so much more!        https://selfhelp.net/
name: Lori Stokes
title: Senior Services New York | Holocaust Survivor Services | Elder Care

content: ~ A great evening supporting a great cause.. which raised close to 1.3 million dollars last night! I was honored to emcee Selfhelp Gala 2017! Servicing some 20,000 New Yorkers... Selfhelp Community Services was founded 81 years ago... the non-profit, non-sectarian organization is dedicated to maintaining the independence and dignity of seniors and at-risk populations through a spectrum of housing, home health care and social services and will lead in applying new methods and technologies to address changing needs of its community. Selfhelp will continue to serve as the "last surviving relative" to its historic constituency, victims of Nazi persecution. Note the photo with a legend... Dr. Ruth Westheimer!
name: Lori Stokes
